desc: Hany's organic apple cider vinegar based wellness Fire Ciders and Oxymel syrups are inspired by age-old herbal recipes for immune and digestive health. Made with premium, raw, organic ingredients such as ginger, turmeric, garlic, elderberries, lemon, dandelion root, and raw honey. carefully crafted in small batches.

layout.text: Rooted in Wellness, Rooted in Community
